creator: anders@blaagaard.net
text:
If you make a Response Assertion and use the NOT option,
this is not reflected in output from the Assertion Results component.

Example:
1) Make an assertion that some page does NOT contain <html>
2) Run the test with page that DOES contain <html>
3) Assertion Results will report: "Test Failed, expected to contain: <html>"

Should be something like: "Test Failed, NOT expected to contain: <html>"
